text: @realDonaldTrump Dear Donald; follow suit before it's too late! ANTIFA is 1000 times more dangerous than Coronavirus&Islamists&Terrorists of all types combined for US of A and for the very entirety of Open Societies worldwide! Time is not in your side; either Do or Doom⏰⌛️
